EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_ThinkingArchitecturally_eBook_Q218.Download Confirmat
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading Thinking Architecturally
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the O'Reilly eBook Thinking Architecturally <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/thinking-architecturally]]>. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you investigate technology options for your cloud-native journey.
Given your interest in this eBook, we thought you might also find these resources of use <[[https://content.pivotal.io/thank-you-for-downloading-thinking-architecturally]]>.
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
